author: China Insights-SOHTV
description:
A courageous Chinese medical student, Luo Shuaiyu, paid the ultimate price for uncovering a horrifying organ harvesting operation within a major hospital. Before his mysterious death, he compiled 16 pounds of damning evidence – including chilling recordings and documents – detailing forced organ extraction, falsified death certificates, and a black market for human body parts. This is his story, his evidence, and the desperate plea of his parents for justice against a system seemingly designed to silence the truth.

For more evidence, please click the link：https://www.upholdjustice.org/
title: The 16-Pound Testament of Horror: Chinese Doctor's Fatal Exposure of Hospital Organ Harvesting Ring
